patthana12.9:1.1: Noāsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanoāsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.9:2.1: Nasāsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naanāsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.9:3.1: Naāsavasampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naāsavavippayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.9:4.1: Naāsavañceva naanāsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.9:5.1: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha pañca. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana12.9:6.1: Naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
